p: S. orientalis subsp. orientalis (245 g, wet) was harvested from the Karadeniz Technical University Campus (Ortahisar, Trabzon, Turkey) at an elevation of 130 m a.s.l. in May 2018. The plant was authenticated by Prof. Salih Terzioğlu [1–3]. A voucher specimen was deposited in the Herbarium of the Faculty of Forestry, KATO (KATO: 19322), Karadeniz Technical University, Trabzon, Turkey.
